headline: P.S.: Fans Still Love ‘To All the Boys’
abstract: Noah Centineo, Lana Condor and hundreds who loved the Netflix rom-com hit walk into a movie theater for the sequel. Cue collective squealing.
lead_paragraph: Nothing truly bonds hundreds of young women like collectively watching Peter Kavinsky, the swoon-inducing love interest of Netflix’s “To All the Boys I’ve Loved Before” films, do something dashing onscreen — and releasing a wave of ear-shattering screams in unison.
keywords: To All the Boys: PS I Still Love You (Movie)
To All the Boys I've Loved Before (Movie)
